Home | About Us | Privacy Policy | Shipping and Returns | Conditions Of Use
Hypnosis Training: Learn Hypnosis and Hypnotherapy Certification - Basic and Advanced
Omni Hypnosis Center Video Training Return and Exchange Policy
Please read carefully before placing your order!
Mechanically defective video/audio tapes may be exchanged for the SAME TITLE ONLY WITHIN 60 DAYS OF PURCHASE. Video, audio tapes or books may NOT be returned for reasons based on content. Books will be exchanged only if damaged in shipping and only for the same title. Exchanges will be made ONLY upon receipt by us of the defective merchandise. We can not be responsible for return shipping cost.
